Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: Breakfast was very poor I read some reviews saying it was good but most things ware bought at the supermarket and of very low quality There was no fresh fruit or juice sausages and cold cuts were terrible very few options compared to most continental breakfasts The lady working at the breakfast was not paying any attention to the buffet or to customers so we found ourselves without glasses or cups and had to ask as well for more food to be taken to the buffet She sounded even a little bit frustrated by that I think waiters should watch the room more closely and ensure everything is always available to customers and customers are happy about the service
Positive_Review: The bed is very comfortable rooms in general are small but very nice and have all that you may need The people at the front desk have been very kind and helpful

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: No negative points
Positive_Review: The staff were extraordinarily friendly smiley and helpful really outstanding In addition the bedding was extraordinarily comfortable and the bedsheets were really soft so much so that they are worth commenting on A real highlight Everything else was just fine the room a little small but nothing out of the ordinary

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: The breakfast facilities were poor no clean tables to sit at dirty plates with half eaten food left on tables and the breakfast choices were left empty No clean plates available Breakfast staff very unhelpful
Positive_Review: The hotel is close to bus and metro lines

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: Rooms not ready on check in Rooms not what we booked Hotel blamed everything from hot weather to tired housekeeping staff Rooms when we got them were lovely Our con was superb
Positive_Review: Recently refurbished Hugh standard of comfort

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Quiet location but close to the metro and lots of very good restaurants and cafes The hotel itself was very good and a great place to relax after a day exploring Paris

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: The downstairs room basement was under construction but they were completely flexible nevertheless
Positive_Review: Great staff Incredibly accommodating Tremendously helpful and flexible

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: Construction during our stay in the lobby meant no lobby and make shift breakfast area We had breakfast one time when I received the final bill it showed that I was billed for breakfast for my daughter and I everyday I was told it w has to be manually put in who saw us eating every morning Two of those mornings we were in London although we kept our room I insisted that my bill be adjusted and it was Breakfast should be free not worth 15 00
Positive_Review: Staff are very nice and professional room room was always clean

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: The hotel was under renovation and we werent imformed this while booking but it didnt cause too much noise
Positive_Review: The staff were extremely helpful and the rooms were lovely even if they were a bit small

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: Breakfast was painful and really of poor quality There are only few tables available in a very tiny reception area room for all customers the staff allocated to the breakfast is extremely slow and have no common sense The quality of the products are very low and the staff is warming up the scrumbled eggs coming from a package behind the bar in a microwave Nothing is fresh everything comes from a package 4 stars hotel With all the brasseries around Champs Elisee area it s better to go out if you really want to enjoy your breakfast
Positive_Review: The room and the bathroom are quite nice

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: very small elevator but climbing the stairs instead is not a problem
Positive_Review: nice cozy small hotel very helpful staff near from the public transportation Metro and RER the offer a drop by transport to CDG airport for 18 Euro

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: False advertising which said the room was soundproof That s why I decided to pay extra to stay here It was a complete lie The walls were paper thin A woman next door was drunk and ranted and yelled at her boyfriend for hours Then she started throwing things I complained to the concierge a couple of times Finally he came up and tapped gently on the disruptive woman s door She didn t answer and he left without talking to her Fortunately she quieted down around 1 a m probably because the alcohol put her to sleep The concierge still should ve talked to her to discourage such behavior in the future The next morning a different concierge double charged me for the room Instead of simply adding breakfast to my bill he also added the cost of my room and insisted this new total would replace the old total I was skeptical I said the bank had no way of knowing how many nights I stayed He acted condescending in the stereotypical Parisian way as if I was an idiot who didn t understand the nuances of banking Well I was charged for two nights and it took multiple calls to the hotel and my bank to straighten it out Incompetence and rudeness is a combination that s hard to forgive
Positive_Review: The concierge when I first arrived was nice She s the only reason I didn t give the staff a total frown rating

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: fact that hotel was undergoing redecoration and we were not told prior to our visit although it did nt spoil our stay and these upgrades have to be done sometime
Positive_Review: Bathroom was high quality and huge bed very comfy

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were really friendly and the location was great There were lots of local bars and resturants It didn t feel like you were in the middle of a tourist trap The nearest landmark was about a 18 min walk away down some lovely streets Or a 9 min run Perfect hotel Perfect weekend

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Really good location Only 10 mins in the Uber taxi which were really cheap Hotel had building work on going but this did not affect us Breakfast was continental My only negative is that we booked a superior room hoping it was going to be a good size but unfortunately it was a bit small and the beds were very small more like children size Staff were very friendly and there service was excellent Thank you for having us

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: My particular room was a bit small but perfectly adequate
Positive_Review: Nice character building in 17th district 20 min walk to Arc de Triomphe Everything you need in the immediate vicinity Staff all very friendly and helpful with good English Good breakfast

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: The air conditioning failed on one night however there was no issue in changing rooms If anything i know its Paris and rooms are small by nature but it did feel a bit cramped
Positive_Review: The staff were always helpful and friendly and the hotel was in a good location next to the train and metro lines with some nice cafes and a park nearby

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: The room smelled very smoky despite the hotel being a non smoking The shower hose had to be held because the piece holding it was loose
Positive_Review: Access to tourist sites and metro was very convenient

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: Breakfast should improve
Positive_Review: Reception Miss Sue is very friendly and helpful Mr reception is very friendly with beautiful smile Sue update me with information about the lovely city of Paris It s help me a lot As a guess and a visitor I much appreciate both of your smile and hospitality Thank you very much Wish to see you

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Warm welcome and quick check in even before our scheduled check in time Room was tidy and clean although a little on the small side Overall though was good value for money and in a pretty good location just a few hundred metres from the Metro and RER

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: Tiny rooms thin walls smallest lift i have ever seen Definitely not a 4 star
Positive_Review: Courteous night staff day staff seemed somewhat distracted Good location

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: Room I have stayed was the corner room quiete small and had a small window Was not a big deal as I did not spent much time in the room
Positive_Review: Excellent location quiete neighborhood with plenty restaurants walking distance to Arc de triomphe and other attractions Good value for money

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: The elevator was too small and clunky The rooms were not sound proof so had to listen to some sweet love making in the middle of the night
Positive_Review: The staff was friendly and helpful The location was convenient however it is a good walk from central Paris

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: Tiny and slow lift but that is the nature of the building Just think it is fair to mantion it in a review
Positive_Review: Finally a wifi that works in a Paris hotel

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: nothin though the hotel is an old one but doesnt destr yed our stay
Positive_Review: The receptionists all of them were amazing Very helpful and friendly Will surely come back

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: The elevator and the room size
Positive_Review: Everything is good stuff wifi room i like it And i want to thank the reception guy at the night shift He helped me to call a taxi at a very late and bad time to go to airport

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: My only complaint is that our coffee mugs weren t changed for the duration of our 4 night stay I don t mind reusing for a few different cups of tea but a new mug every day would have been nice Bathroom was a little small also but well appointed and clean
Positive_Review: A small hotel in a lovely residential area slightly away from the main sights but a few minutes walk from a convenient metro Helpful friendly staff and a comfortable cosy room with a view of Sacre Coeur Some nice cafes to eat breakfast or have coffee nearby

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: Good but expensive with 498 euro for one person and two nights incl breakfast My check up after the stay shows no similar regular prices for the same room type during October or November why
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: The hotel appears to be attached to a residential building and the walls are very thin On the last night of our stay was a raging house party that didn t stop until 4am We could hear everything and didn t get a wink of sleep Was so loud the pictures were moving off the wall due to the loudness of the party
Positive_Review: Staff was very helpful and the location was four minute walk away from an RER and Metro line also the area was safe and lots of places to eat within five minute walk

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: My only small negative point is that i felt the cleaners came round too early We stayed for 4 nights one morning we fancied a lie in cleaners came round at 1030 so it meant for that day we did not get our room cleaned
Positive_Review: Staff where exceptionally good Couldnt do enough to help Location was brilliant for Metro stations and acces to Champs D elysee Lots of decent restauants nearby although some where pricy

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Lovely clean hotel Friendly staff Stayed at this hotel previously and really enjoy the area located close to lovely restaurants and cafes while only being a ten minute walk from the Champs Elysees and the Arc Will definitely stay again

Hotel_Name: Best Western Plus de Neuville Arc de Triomphe
Negative_Review: nothing really
Positive_Review: This trip to Paris was a birthday present to my mother so I picked the hotel carefully When we arrived I immediately understood that the choice was right Staff was so helpful and friendly rooms nicely furnished view from our room was simply beautiful Finally the location was perfect close to metro but also in a walking distance to arc de triomphe There was a bakery just 2 min away from hotel with fresh everything We had a pleasant and relaxing stay thanks to this hotel
